    public static class Search.Builder
extends Object
    Builder for a Search command.

      • Search.Builder

        public Search.Builder(String index,
              String query)
        Construct a Builder for a Search command.
        Parameters:
        index - The index to search.
        query - The query to execute against the index.

    • Method Detail

      • withPresort

        public Search.Builder withPresort(Search.Presort presort)
        Set the presort option, you may presort the results by Key or Score.
        Parameters:
        presort - the Search.Presort option to set.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withStart

        public Search.Builder withStart(int start)
        Set the starting row to return.
        Parameters:
        start - the first row to return out of the result set. Use in conjunction with withRows(int) to paginate the results.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withRows

        public Search.Builder withRows(int rows)
        Set the maximum number of rows to return.
        Parameters:
        rows - The total number of rows to return. Use in conjunction with withStart(int) to paginate the results.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withOption

        public <T> Search.Builder withOption(Search.Option<T> option,
                            T value)
        Add an optional setting for this command. This will be passed along with the request to Riak to tell it how to behave when servicing the request.
        Parameters:
        option - the option.
        value - the value for the option.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

        Set the list of fields that should be returned for each record in the result set.

      • returnFields

        public Search.Builder returnFields(String... fields)
        Set the list of fields that should be returned for each record in the result set.
